message.body: Hey, we're going to adobe probably around 9
Ok... my friends are being a pain in the ###, can I ask what your roommate and coworker look like? Lol
Lmao... uh, sure. My roommate is 25, white. About 5'3 and average build? That enough info? Lol. Co-worker is black, I think she is 28-29. And about the same height as roommate. On the heavier side.
I promise they aren't hideous lol
Awesome thx. . I told them idk and no I'm not asking for pics.. crazy. .lol..
Hey, do you kind if we reschedule? Gall asked me to work tonight
He asked me too I told him I'm going down the shore..lol..ok.sure..
I originally told him I was available and then he never put me on. Plus I can't work any day next week except this sunday so would rather make the money to night to make up for missing next week....
He said he might not need me bec he has two closers so I'm just waiting on a def answer from him
I understand.. maybe you and I can get together next week?
Next week would be too hard... 3 cake orders due next weekend. But I'm not working tonight so Steph and I are still going out
Friend is unsure if she can make it
We'll still be going same time regardless
Ok..now I have a problem. .lol. after u told me u were gonna work I made other plans.. let me figure something out
Ahaha ok just let me know, we'll be there and if you can't make it, no biggie we'll do something another time
U still going?
Yea.. within the half hr
I just woke up from a nap.. I'm gonna start getting ready then meet up with u,. I hope it's cool but I can't find my friends so I'm coming alone
Oh yea that's fine
Hey, I'm sorry but I gotta go back to sleep, I just don't feel well at all..
Ok no problem
